name: Galaxy Empire
startIntroPart1: Hail,Lord Vader. You with your command on star destroyer flight through galaxy, before once day, you reached planet that known as Urthaa. Gravity of local planet,known as Japutir, defected appliances of your cruiser,and you with your command crashed on Urtaa's surface.
startIntroPart2: Attention,best experience will be if you start game in modern age!
declaringWar: Empire see purpose in your resources lands and people.Obey and you may get spared
attacked: You dare even have such absurd thought in your easy to break head?Brave but foolish
hateLetsHearIt: Speak,and i advise it to be loyal to empire,mere leader
tradeRequest: It's in your interests to cooperate with empire
